entry.cantonese: 你叫咩名？你叫乜嘢名呀？請問你貴姓呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 giu3 me1 ming4? nei5 giu3 mat1 je5 ming4 aa3? cing2 man6 nei5 gwai3 sing3 aa3?
entry.english: What is your name? What is your surname?

entry.cantonese: 你點呀？你最近點啊？屋企人點啊？
entry.jyutping: nei5 dim2 aa3? nei5 zeoi3 gan6 dim2 aa3? uk1 kei5 jan4 dim2 aa3?
entry.english: How are you? How have you been recently? How is your family?

entry.cantonese: 你點解要學外語呀？你鍾意學語言嗎？你啲中文學成點呀？你學咗幾耐廣東話？
entry.jyutping: nei5 dim2 gaai2 jiu3 hok6 ngoi6 jyu5 aa3? nei5 zung1 ji3 hok6 jyu5 jin4 maa1? nei5 di1 zung1 man4 hok6 sing4 dim2 aa3? nei5 hok6 zo2 gei2 noi6 gwong2 dung1 waa2?
entry.english: Why do you want to learn foreign languages? Do you like learning languages? How is your Chinese learning going? How long have you been learning Cantonese?

entry.cantonese: 你鍾意食法國嘢，日本嘢定係中國嘢？你鍾唔鍾意廣東菜？英國嘢咩？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zung1 ji3 sik6 faat3 gwok3 je5, jat6 bun2 je5 ding6 hai6 zung1 gwok3 je5? nei5 zung1 m4 zung1 ji3 gwong2 dung1 coi3? jing1 gwok3 je5 me1?
entry.english: Do you like French, Japanese, or Chinese food? Do you like Cantonese cuisine? What about British food?

entry.cantonese: 你由邊度嚟架？你系邊度人？你喺邊度住呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau4 bin1 dou6 lai4 gaa3? nei5 hai6 bin1 dou6 jan4? nei5 hai2 bin1 dou6 zyu6 aa3?
entry.english: Where are you from? Where are you originally from? Where do you live?

entry.cantonese: 你識講廣東話咩？你嘅英文點呀？你仲識講咩語言？
entry.jyutping: nei5 sik1 gong2 gwong2 dung1 waa2 me1? nei5 ge3 jing1 man4 dim2 aa3? nei5 zung6 sik1 gong2 me1 jyu5 jin4?
entry.english: Can you speak Cantonese? How is your English? What other languages can you speak?

entry.cantonese: 夏天過成點呀？你暑假做咗啲咩？你有冇去旅行？
entry.jyutping: haa6 tin1 gwo3 sing4 dim2 aa3? nei5 syu2 gaa3 zou6 zo2 di1 me1? nei5 jau5 mou5 heoi3 leoi5 hang4?
entry.english: How was your summer? What did you do during your summer vacation? Did you travel?

entry.cantonese: 而家幾點鐘呀？今日幾多號？今日星期幾？
entry.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 gei2 dim2 zung1 aa3? gam1 jat6 gei2 do1 hou6? gam1 jat6 sing1 kei4 gei2?
entry.english: What time is it now? What is today's date? What day is it today?

entry.cantonese: 你最近忙唔忙呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zeoi3 gan6 mong4 m4 mong4 aa3?
entry.english: Have you been busy lately?

entry.cantonese: 你作咩嘢架？你做乜嘢工作呀？你喺邊度返工？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zok3 me1 je5 gaa3? nei5 zou6 mat1 je5 gung1 zok3 aa3? nei5 hai2 bin1 dou6 faan1 gung1?
entry.english: What do you do? What kind of work do you do? Where do you work?

entry.cantonese: 你係唔係住喺英國？住喺倫敦邊度？住咗幾耐？
entry.jyutping: nei5 hai6 m4 hai6 zyu6 hai2 jing1 gwok3? zyu6 hai2 jing1 gwok3/leon4 deon1 bin1 dou6? zyu6 zo2 gei2 noi6?
entry.english: Do you live in the UK? Where in the London do you live? How long have you lived there?

entry.cantonese: 返工返成點呀？學得點呀？
entry.jyutping: faan1 gung1 faan1 sing4 dim2 aa3? hok6 dak1 dim2 aa3?
entry.english: How is work going? How is studying going?

entry.cantonese: 你有冇去過中國呀？你去過美國未？有冇去過香港？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 heoi3 gwo3 zung1 gwok3 aa3? nei5 heoi3 gwo3 mei5 gwok3 mei6? jau5 mou5 heoi3 gwo3 hoeng1 gong2?
entry.english: Have you been to China? Have you been to the US? Have you been to Hong Kong?

entry.cantonese: 你鍾唔鍾意食中國嘢㗎？你鍾意食咩中國菜？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zung1 m4 zung1 ji3 sik6 zung1 gwok3 je5 gaa3? nei5 zung1 ji3 sik6 me1 zung1 gwok3 coi3?
entry.english: Do you like Chinese food? What Chinese dishes do you like?

entry.cantonese: 你嘅愛好係咩？有空嘅時候你鍾意做咩？
entry.jyutping: nei5 ge3 oi3 hou3 hai6 me1? jau5 hung1 ge3 si4 hau6 nei5 zung1 ji3 zou6 me1?
entry.english: What are your hobbies? What do you like to do in your free time?

entry.cantonese: 聽見話學中文嘅外國人多數都學國語。係唔係真㗎？
entry.jyutping: teng1 gin3 waa6 hok6 zung1 man4 ge3 ngoi6 gwok3 jan4 do1 sou3 dou1 hok6 gwok3 jyu5. hai6 m4 hai6 zan1 gaa3?
entry.english: I heard that most foreigners learning Chinese study Mandarin. Is that true?

entry.cantonese: 你食完晚飯通常做乜嘢？
entry.jyutping: nei5 sik6 jyun4 maan5 faan6 tung1 soeng4 zou6 mat1 je5?
entry.english: What do you usually do after dinner?

entry.cantonese: 你最鍾意邊個歌手呀？你最鍾意嘅電視節目係咩？你最鍾意嘅專輯係咩？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 bin1 go3 go1 sau2 aa3? nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 ge3 din6 si6 zit3 muk6 hai6 me1? nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 ge3 zyun1 cap1 hai6 me1?
entry.english: Who is your favorite singer? What is your favorite TV show? What is your favorite album?

entry.cantonese: 你哋屋企聖誕節通常會食咩做晚餐㗎？
entry.jyutping: nei5 dei6 uk1 kei5 sing3 daan3 zit3 tung1 soeng4 wui5 sik6 me1 zou6 maan5 caan1 gaa3?
entry.english: What does your family usually eat for Christmas dinner?

entry.cantonese: 你而家用緊邊部手機㗎？
entry.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 jung6 gan2 bin1 bou6 sau2 gei1 gaa3?
entry.english: What phone are you currently using?

entry.cantonese: 你今個禮拜返咗幾多個鐘呀？
你鍾意聽音樂多啲吖，定係唱歌多啲呀？
你諗住去邊度過你個暑假呀？
你有冇養寵物㗎？
你通常幾點鐘起身㗎？
你有冇喺學校到讀中文？
呢個世界有冇外星人㗎？
你信唔信奇跡㗎？
你點樣減壓？
呢個世界係咪電腦模擬出嚟嘅呢？
如果而家停電，會發生啲咩事呢？
講大話可唔可以係合符道德嘅呢？
可唔可以介紹幾味齋菜呀？
你上次捐錢係幾時？
你聖誕假諗住去邊玩呀？你成世人收過最正嘅聖誕禮物係咩呀？你想聖誕老人送咩禮物俾你呀？
你覺得你喺倫敦每日淨係用五英鎊生唔生活到？
你覺得可以做啲咩嚟減低倫敦嘅空氣污染呢？
發展經濟重要啲吖，定係保護環境重要啲？
